briefdescription.para: Map of all histories, the int represents the cycle seperation, the list is the resultant values/averages.

detaileddescription.para:
eg
mapping of 1 to a list of ClusterAnalysisData is the standard save of every cycles history (up to cutoff)
mapping of 10 means that every 10 cycles are averaged and the result added to the mapped list
Note that mapping steps are recursive, we can only have int keys as multiples of each other, eg {1, 2, 4, 8, etc} or {1, 10, 100, ... } , so { 1, a, a^2, a^3, ... }

simplesect.para: const common::SimpleCollection<ClusterAnalysisData> & The container with the history of analysis

memberdef.argsstring: (boost::shared_ptr< components::Node > nodeStart, boost::shared_ptr< components::Node > nodeEnd, int connectivity=1)
memberdef.name: createConnection

bool Allow the random nodes to be attached primaries, default false

briefdescription.para: Get the fraction of history entries from the past count entries that are inside of a range, default is to check all of them.
